Hey, pls help! I can see all the Audio Companion files, but when I'm trying to mount the CDs, all I get is a folder with 4 other folders ("data", "documentation", "languages" and "speech"). What can I do?? 
ps: I'm using MagicISO

IT WORKS!! And I finally got it. For all of you who say they just see 4 folders when they mount - here is the solution!
You need the basic Rosetta Stone program in order to run the Arabic one. So what you have to do FIRST is download Rosetta Stone (I found it here, and it works just fine: http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/3852202/The_Rosetta_Stone_Application_(Version_3) )
After that, when you open Rosetta Stone, it asks you to chose a language, and that's when the mounted CDs will work by themselves.
Hope it helps! :)
